author: remyroy
content: <@!291925846556540928> Hello Danny, GUI dev teams and consensus client dev teams have been in touch for a few days now on various channels including on the StakeHouse discord server. We would like to create a new repo under the ethereum org on Github called `validator-apis` to start collaborating more efficiently on those validator key management APIs and eventually broader validator APIs. Do you think you can help us with that?
